title: M5: PE Effort Wordsearch
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 7 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: This activity focuses on concepts discussed in section 4 of chapter 5. Students should find the words from the grid.
